漏.definition: to leak; to divulge; to leave out by mistake; waterclock or hourglass (old)

漏失.definition: to lose sth due to leakage; to let sth slip through; a slip-up; an oversight

漏掉.definition: to miss; to leave out; to omit; to be omitted; to be missing; to slip through; to leak out; to seep away

漏水轉渾天儀.pinyin: lòu shuǐ zhuǎn hún tiān yí
漏水轉渾天儀.definition: water-driven armillary sphere (Zhang Heng's famous astronomical apparatus)

漏油.definition: oil spill; oil leak; (fig.) boo! (opposite of 加油[jia1 you2])

漏洞百出.definition: (of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)

漏洩天機.definition: to divulge the will of heaven (idiom); to leak a secret; to let the cat out of the bag

漏網之魚.definition: lit. a fish that escaped the net (idiom); fig. sb or sth that slips through the net

漏網游魚.definition: see 漏網之魚|漏网之鱼[lou4 wang3 zhi1 yu2]

漏脯充飢.definition: lit. to eat rotten meat to assuage hunger (idiom); fig. to disregard long-term consequences for short-term benefits; shortsighted

漏電.definition: to leak electricity; (fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc); cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
